vidis.data.mod
Interface IUserLink

All Superinterfaces:
IUserComponent
All Known Implementing Classes:
AUserLink, DefaultLink, DefaultLink, DefaultLink, DemoLink
public interface IUserLink
extends IUserComponent

this interface defines a basic functionality for all user module links; anyway for implementation of a new link in a ne module, the class AUserLink should be used instead. we implemented there the basic functionality so that simulator and module can flawlessly work together

Author:
Dominik
See Also:
AUserLink
